mapper.select: select deptcode, deptname, businessname, usestatus, parentcode, companycode from dept
mapper.insert: insert into dept (deptcode, deptname, businessname, usestatus, parentcode, companycode) values (#{deptCode},#{deptName},nvl(#{businessName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),#{useStatus},nvl(#{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),#{companyCode})
mapper.select: select deptcode, deptname, businessname, usestatus, parentcode, companycode from dept where deptcode = #{deptcode}
